Name: CO2 ABSORBER FILTER REPLACEMENT
checklistText:
<size=21>4.5.4.3 CO2 Absorber Filter Replacement</size>

				CAUTION
		Conn grd wire when removing or replacing filters from cstr or
		stowage.

			Obtain unused filter
			Open CO2 cstr atten pnl

Panel 350	CO2 CSTR DIVERT vlv 			- up (or dn)

Remarks: Air flows through if handles points towards the middle of the 
	two assemblies.

			Replace A:
				Move handle to right
				Press C and press "REPLACE CANNISTER"
				Move handle to left

			Replace B:
				Move handle to left
				Press C and press "REPLACE CANNISTER"
				Move handle to right

Original procedures (bypass these for now)
			
				CAUTION
		Apply press to latching handle to allow press interlock pin to 
		withdraw, otherwise latching handle may not disengage.

			Cstr man bleed vlv 					- press
			Cover latching handle 				- unlock
			Replace used filter
			Cover latching handle 				- lock
			CO2 CSTR DIVERT vlv 				- ctr
			Close CO2 cstr atten pnl
			Stow used filter
			Stow excess shims in volume B5 or B6
